content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Hassan. As the landlord, I am looking for a fair and reasonable rental price that will allow me to maximize my gains. May I ask what your budget is for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 1000 Euros per month. Is that a fair price for a 25 square meter apartment in New York?

Please note that I am a student and I need a reliable and responsible tenant. Therefore, I am willing to negotiate and find a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your offer, Hassan. A rental price of 1000 Euros per month for a 25 square meter apartment in New York is certainly fair and reasonable, but it may be negotiable depending on the specific circumstances and the market demand.

As a landlord, I am always looking for a reliable and responsible tenant who will take good care of the apartment and pay rent on time. In that regard, I would like to ask you a few questions to better understand your needs and expectations.

Firstly, how long do you plan to rent the apartment for?

Secondly, do you have any specific requirements or preferences regarding the apartment, such as a particular location or amenities?

Finally, are you willing to sign a long-term lease or are you looking for a shorter-term rental agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I plan to rent the apartment for a minimum of one year and a maximum of two years. I don't have any specific requirements or preferences regarding the apartment. I am willing to sign a long-term lease.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your responses, Hassan. Based on your budget and the length of your rental period, I would like to propose a rental price of 1200 Euros per month for the apartment.

This price takes into account the market demand and the specific features of the apartment, as well as the fact that you are a responsible tenant who is willing to sign a long-term lease.

I believe that this price is fair and reasonable, and I am confident that we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to let me know. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine
